# [Interview #1047: WOR Signing Report - Herowannabe, Entry #33](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1047#33)

#### Question

Does Vasher want Nightblood back?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Vasher feels responsible for Nightblood.
